sense.gloss: dropping in on the way, stopping off at, making a side trip
going the long way round, making a detour

sdata.j: ぶらぶら|↑寄↑↓よ↓り↑道|↑↓みち↓していこうよ。
sdata.e: Let's just wander and see where it takes us.

sdata.j: |↑寄↑↓よ↓り↑道|↑↓みち↓せずに↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑帰↑↓かえ↓るつもりだったのに、つい↑本屋↑↓ほんや↓へと↑足↑↓あし↓が↑向↑↓む↓いてしまう。
sdata.e: I intended to go straight back home, but I sort of wandered inside a bookstore.
